name: Two Portals - A Gemstone Puzzle Game
name_original: Two Portals - A Gemstone Puzzle Game
description:
Two Portals - A Gemstone Puzzle Game is a grid-based movement minimalist puzzle game.

Your mission is to activate amazing gemstones, which will connect the passages to the grid, and lead you to keys and locks! When all locks are unlocked, the portal will be activated, and you can advance to the next level!


Gameplay


- The player controls a silver sphere that can be moved around the grid, using the arrow keys.
- The portal to the next level will only be activated when all locks on the current level get unlocked.
- There are three types of gemstones spreaded out around the grid: yellow, purple and green.
- When a gemstone is activated, it will make a certain passage of the same color join the grid and, in this way, you will be able to move the silver sphere to other parts where it was not possible.


Features


- A relaxing atmosphere, with a background that changes as you pass a number of levels.
- Unique art style with beautiful gemstones.
- There are 60 levels, providing a unique experience that will stimulate your brain!

In the first levels, the puzzles are easy, and the difficulty gradually increases as you progress through the game!
